About Me

Hi! I’m Pete Chen, a graduate student at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign (MIM ‘26).
I specialize in data analytics, visualization, and machine learning.
My background blends technical skills with business insight — I enjoy using data to tell clear, actionable stories.

Master of Information Management, University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign

2023 — present

Pursuing graduate studies with a focus on data analytics, data visualization, and machine learning. Completed coursework in relational database design, sociotechnical systems, and information modeling. Maintained a 4.0 GPA while contributing to multiple hands-on data visualization projects using Python and SQL.

Fintech Analyst Intern, China Telecom

2023 — 2024

Developed and maintained financial dashboards using Tableau and Power BI to monitor key performance indicators. Automated forecasting pipelines using Python and SQL, enabling more accurate financial projections for the fintech division. Supported the digital transformation of business intelligence processes across departments.

Co-Founder, Carpe Diem LTD

2021 — 2023

Launched and operated a startup offering interactive entertainment experiences. Built a customer-facing WeChat Mini Program and implemented machine learning-based user segmentation strategies. Designed ETL processes in Python to streamline customer analytics and marketing automation.

Bachelor of Arts in Economics, Boston University

2020 — 2023

Completed a rigorous economics curriculum with emphasis on quantitative analysis and applied statistics. Participated in several research-oriented projects involving Excel-based modeling and econometrics. Earned Dean’s List honors in 2022 while also preparing for transition into the data analytics field.

Project Management Intern, SolutionKeys LTD

2020 — 2020

Collaborated with senior managers to oversee internal web platform improvements and feature rollouts. Conducted market research and supported UX refinement through user surveys and interface audits. Gained early exposure to project coordination and strategic planning in a fast-paced environment.
